document.description: ... go for this offer...it does look like you will recieve ... the info form, the "Submit" button says "Submit my Order." ... Fast Food & Restaurant Coupons; Drug Store & Pharmacy ...

03-19-2011, 05:29 AM #1 HeleneVT View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries Visit Homepage View Articles Registered User Join Date Feb 2004 Posts 394 3 Free Issues of Sandra Lee Semi-Homemade Magazine http://www.semihomemademag.com/3free Reply With Quote 03-19-2011, 08:38 AM #2 VanillaCoke View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Nov 2007 Posts 28 "Included with your purchase of The Complete Cookbook are 3 free issues of Sandra Lee Semi-Homemade magazine. Compliments of Sandra Lee."
Does this mean they're going to try to ship us a cookbook and charge for it..... Reply With Quote 03-19-2011, 09:29 AM #3 doctordog View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles 1/2007 Join Date Apr 2002 Location was the frozen tundra of Wis...now ohio Posts 631 just looked at the site I wouldnt go for this offer...it does look like you will recieve a cookbook and be charged so buyer beware Reply With Quote 03-19-2011, 09:31 AM #4 mrohe View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Feb 2003 Posts 62 It WILL be yours after you pay the invoice they send you for the cookbook. When you look at the info form, the"Submit"button says"Submit my Order."You are ordering a cookbook and I trust you will get a bill for it, so the magazines aren't really free. Reply With Quote 03-22-2011, 07:14 PM #5 kellykcmom63 View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Mar 2011 Posts 165
I went for it! If I receive a bill for a cookbook I'll just cancel! Reply With Quote
